categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order organizations

nodes.text: CompForce was the elite military branch of the Galactic Empire's Commission for the Preservation of the New Order, the Imperial bureaucracy's largest agency. CompForce members were known to be extreme followers of Imperial ideals, so much so that the Imperial Military disliked competition and, in their view, the arrogance displayed by the organization.

CompForce also had two secondary divisions, the Assault and Observation subdivisions. The Assault subdivision was an elite unit that were dispatched on special missions, while the Observation subdivision was an elite unit that spied on, and within, Imperial Military starships and units, serving essentially as loyalty spies.
